cities.name: Quezon City
cities.description: Where old neighborhoods meet city culture.
cities.culture: Quezon City is not just big in land area — it's big in personality. Once the capital of the Philippines, the city was designed with wide avenues, government complexes, and civic landmarks that still shape its identity today.
cities.foodScene: QC is famous for street food hubs, café culture, and international dining. Whether you want budget eats or aesthetic restaurants, you'll find them here.
cities.whyVisit: It's one of the most diverse cities in Metro Manila — perfect for food trips, spontaneous hangouts, and discovering underrated gems.
